headline: CarMax (KMX) Valuation Check After Sharp Three Month Share Price Rebound
summary: Why CarMax is on investors’ radar today CarMax (KMX) has drawn fresh attention after a recent share move, with the stock up about 17% over the past month and roughly 53% in the past 3 months. That shift comes against a 1 year total return of about 44% decline and a 5 year total return near 62% decline, prompting investors to reassess what the current price might be implying about the used vehicle retailer’s prospects.
